name: web-content-filter
description: A content filter for websites, emulating dansguardianâ€™s score-based filter in JavaScript.

scripts.oldkarmatest: env CHROME_BIN=/usr/bin/chromium karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless karma.conf.js
scripts.test: mkdir -p testout && env multi="json=testout/$(date +%s).json xunit=testout/$(date +%s).xml spec=-" npx mocha -R mocha-multi addon/*test.js

author: github.com/serv-inc
